title: Interpretation of a coffin in a dream: Seeing a coffin in a dream

preview.html: The coffin: It is what is placed on the body of the dead person with a shroud for the funeral procession in the grave, whether it is empty or contains the unknown dead person, for an unmarried girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for the Imam Al. - Sadiq Umm Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the coffin in a dream. The coffin can be a sign of recovery in the state and circumstances of the fortuneteller, because most of the interpretations given to him are praiseworthy. Seeing as if you are lying in a coffin and people are carrying you or accompanying you. This dream is good and shows the important status that you can rise and aim among the people and the same. The thing is if you see a familiar face, your falling from the coffin may indicate losing your place among the people. Whoever dreams that he is lying in a coffin and does not see anyone carrying him or holding a funeral, this may indicate his imprisonment or imprisonment, and also if you see a familiar person, seeing an unknown body in a coffin indicates problems and problems that may You face it in your life. Seeing an empty coffin in a dream can indicate depression, mistrust, or confusion that the dreamer may have regarding matters that concern him. Seeing a broken coffin in a dream indicates anxiety and discomfort that may affect the dreamer. Seeing many coffins in a dream, whether they are Empty or containing corpses, it is usually a reflection of a state of stress, tension, or fear for the fate of a relationship or project. Whoever sees in his dream a funeral being placed in a coffin, and there was no one to carry his coffin to hold the funeral, then his vision indicates the imprisonment of the dreamer. If he sees In a dream that someone is carrying him in a coffin, his vision indicates that the dreamer will mingle with a prominent man and accompany him and earn wealth and money from him. Whoever sees in his dream that he is placed in the coffin of the dead and that people are preparing for his funeral and sees him being carried on their shoulders, then his vision shows that he will assume a high position And gain glory. And honor and that the people will submit to him in his city and that his followers will be as much as he saw at his funeral. Whoever sees in his dream that people shed tears and cry at his funeral or pray to God for him and talk about his goodness, the dream indicates that the dreamer will end his life with a good ending. Whoever sees In a dream, people do not cry over him, but stab him and curse him, so the dream indicates a horrific end. Whoever sees in his dream that he is walking behind the funeral and following it, his vision indicates that he will pursue an unjust ruler whose morals are corrupt. The person who sees in his dream that the funeral is inside the market, then the dream The great hypocrisy of the people of the market who saw it in a dream appears. And whoever sees in his dream a funeral in which women walk and not the men, then the dream indicates a ruler who was followed by volatile things or surrounded by confusion and ambiguity. Imam Nabulsi said that whoever saw in his dream that he was performing the funeral prayer over a dead person. The dream indicates that the dreamer will mingle and meet new people united by the bond of love with God, and there is no position between them for the sake of interests. The Imam said that a funeral in a dream indicates hypocrisy that exterminates a group of corrupt people. The Imam said that whoever sees in his dream that he is lying In a coffin and not carried on his shoulders in the dream, then the dream indicates that the dreamer will be imprisoned, but if he is carried on his shoulders, then the vision indicates

title: Interpretation of dreams: I am trapped in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams that I closed my mouth in a dream You are looking for interpretations to see that I am mute, then we present what it means. Interpretation of the dream that I closed my mouth in a dream. All this and more details are according to interpretations from scholars and translators and not personal interpretations. Interpretation of dreams that I am locked in a dream. Interpretation of dreams that I am silent In a dream, silence can lead to weakness and incompetence, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees silence in a dream, it may be evidence of weak character, and God knows the unseen. When you see a married woman silent in a dream, it may be tantamount to committing sins and disobedience, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, seeing a married man is silent. Being mute can indicate the transgressions and sins he commits, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. I dreamed that I was speaking and no one heard me in the dream. I dreamed that I was speaking and no one heard me in the dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing yourself screaming without anyone hearing it can lead to relief from anxiety, God willing. When you see yourself screaming without a sound, it can be a sign of goodness and sustenance, God willing. If a married woman sees herself screaming without a sound in... In a dream, this may indicate goodness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. I dreamed that I was carrying a knife in a dream. I dreamed that I was carrying a knife in a dream, and we did not find specific interpretations to see that. However, seeing a knife in a dream could be a sign of marriage, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried young man sees a knife in A dream may be a sign of marriage, and God knows the unseen. When a married woman sees a knife in a dream, this may indicate sustenance and offspring, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. I dreamed that I was walking on a piece of paper in a dream. I dreamed that I was walking on a piece of paper in a dream. Signing papers may indicate a new commitment, and God knows best. If a young man is seen signing papers, it is permissible for him to be transferred to the obligation he is bound to, and God knows the unseen. When you see a married woman signing her papers, this may be a sign of repentance, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing someone signing papers without knowing what It is present on the leaves. It can indicate illness, and God knows the unseen. I dreamed that I was wiping kohl from my eyes in a dream. I dreamed that I was wiping kohl from my eyes in a dream. It can lead to anxiety, and God knows everything that is not seen. If a married woman sees herself wiping kohl from her eyes in a dream, this may be evidence of exposure to trouble, and God knows best. When a single girl sees herself wiping kohl in a dream, it could be a sign of sadness and distress, and God knows best. If A divorced woman saw herself in a dream wiping her eyeliner. This may indicate despair, and God knows all that is unseen. I dreamed that I was holding the Black Stone in a dream. I dreamed that I was holding the Black Stone in a dream. It may be a sign that you follow one of the imams, and God knows the unseen. Just as the black stone may represent the mosque, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see yourself touching the black stone in a dream, this could be a sign of goodness, God willing. If a young man sees himself touching the black stone in the dream.

title: Interpretation of seeing travel in a dream: traveling by train or plane in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of travel for single women, married women, and pregnant women, whether by car, camel, or horse, and a husband’s trip to see someone traveling to America, a vision, a passport, and a visa. Traveling in a dream indicates a change in the dreamer’s condition from one state or situation to another. If the dreamer feels during his dream With feelings of happiness and pleasure, this is an indication that the situation has changed for the better and vice versa. Traveling by plane in a dream, because the plane is the fastest means of transportation for a person. A symbol of success and distinction, whether that success is in study, at work, or even in marriage. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is traveling and leaving while driving The train, this symbolizes that this person will receive all his benefits from someone he does not know, with a difference in the type of benefit, which may be material or moral. Benefit. To see someone in his dream as if he is traveling on a ship, boat, or ship and of course travel to distant lands, this symbolizes the presence of a woman in your life who supports you financially or morally so that you can achieve your dream and arrive. To see someone in his dream as if he is traveling and leaving in... A bus, a coach, or a bus symbolizes a sudden change and a shift in his financial resources for the better, which means that he receives a large sum of money that changes his life. It may be the result of a prize or inheritance. As for seeing a person as if he were traveling in a car, this is praiseworthy, as it indicates the ease of life and the ease of its progress and development in a natural and good way, whether in emotional or practical life, especially if the road is suitable. smooth. And easy. Traveling by bicycle or motorcycle in a dream symbolizes the dreamer gaining great fame in the future, and this fame will be particularly in this person’s field of work. Animals are the animals used for travel and transportation, such as a camel, horse, donkey, colt, and others, and the person who sees himself traveling Using one of these animals symbolizes the fulfillment of an unattainable dream. And livelihood is insignificant. Traveling with a camel indicates large sums of money, a horse symbolizes progress in work, and a donkey and a colt mean assuming a position or authority. Traveling to distant European countries in a dream symbolizes marriage, and an African country is a sign of kindness and abundant nutrition. The American state is a sign of success and victory. The vision of the trip to Egypt is a symbol of safety, protection and divine care, Lebanon is a symbol of money and profit, Saudi Arabia is a symbol of blessing and religiosity, the Levant (Syria) is a symbol of marriage, Tunisia is a symbol of affection, friendship and love, Algeria is joy and pleasure, Morocco is a symbol Pride and pride. Sudan is a symbol of work. Iraq is a symbol of knowledge. Traveling in a dream for an unmarried person to a distant country symbolizes the desire of one of her relatives to marry her, and if she accepts the marriage, she will live in bliss and happiness and give birth to good offspring. As for seeing travel in a pregnant woman’s dream, it is a symbol of increasing goodness. Blessings are for her as well as for her children, and this vision indicates easy birth and good offspring, God willing. A passport in a dream is...

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing someone signing a paper in a dream

preview.html: A person signing a piece of paper in a dream for a single woman symbolizes a vision of joy. The relative is engaged or married, has a lot of inheritance and is happy with that. Evidence that he earns a lot of money by collecting something he sold or won from a competition. It expresses that a person takes the opinion of good things and that God blesses them. Interpretation of a dream of signing a paper for singles It suggests that I hear news that makes a single girl very happy. It foretells joy and happiness for the girl and the engagement or marriage of a good man. Evidence of finding a new job or a job that I was very happy with. Perhaps this paper connects its goals and depends on the search in reality. I dreamed of falling on a white paper in a dream, indicating sincere repentance to God. An unmarried girl signing in a dream on a white paper expresses her anger because she did something in her life and strongly rejects it. Seeing the seal and signature in a dream is evidence that he is trying to satisfy many desires and that the dreamer will achieve many achievements and be proud of them. The seal is evidence of gaining a respectable and high position. The seal symbolizes gaining personal benefits for the dreamer. What if he saw in a dream? The seal was made of silver or Iron It represents collecting a lot of money. I saw in my dream that I was stamping a lot of papers, indicating that successes have been achieved and what the dreamer seeks, a great victory and a rise in status. It is also evidence of occupying a high position in society. I dreamed that I was stamping a paper, but my father died at the time. It indicates the opposite of the vision to the opposite or getting a job but for a temporary period. As for signing travel documents or a work contract, it means achieving success and winning goals. I saw that I was signing a bank check to warn you of the crisis and distress in your financial situation, and God Almighty knows best. The director’s signature on a single woman’s dream shows that she has achieved a lot of what she was looking for with a great achievement in her life. It indicates her highness and social status among people. It promises stability in the girl’s health and psychological condition at that stage of her life. As for seeing the contract in her dream, it expresses a covenant or a covenant before God with someone. I have signed a contract in a dream, indicating engagement and marriage for a long time. The contract and its signing in the dream of an unmarried woman is a sign of hearing happy and joyful news. Perhaps I will move to another country and travel God knows best. But if she sees herself signing a contract, this is the fulfillment of the desires she wants to achieve. Signing in a dream about a divorced woman is evidence of reconciliation or returning to her home and again to her husband. It indicates getting rid of the many disputes and problems in her life and ending a period of sadness and feeling restless. It expresses returning to God and repenting from her sins and the sins of her life and repenting to God. I signed a marriage contract in a dream I am distinguished by announcing marriage to a man who does my best to compensate for the above and make her happy. Interpretation of a dream about writing a name When you dream of writing a name in a dream and drawing it beautifully. The person announces socially, morally and diplomatically in a dialogue with others. Write a letter to someone in a dream Expresses the disclosure of some secrets

Interpretation of dreams about my enemy eating in my house in a dream. To see myself entering the enemy’s house may indicate hypocrisy, and God knows best. If a married woman is seen entering the enemy’s house, this may lead to hypocrisy and deception, and God knows the unseen. If a young man sees himself entering the enemy’s house, this may mean that he has left and left, and God knows best. In the event that an unmarried girl is seen Entering the enemy's house may lead to deception and hypocrisy, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my enemy talking to me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my enemy talking to me in a dream. Maybe talking to someone with whom he is in a dispute means getting rid of problems, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. If a married man is seen talking to someone in a dispute With him, it is permissible for him to reconcile, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees N

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing an accident in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing an accident in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about seeing an accident in a dream, which we present to you today through this article on CG Arabia after many messages that we received requesting an explanation of this dream, as we noticed that many people want to interpret it due to extreme anxiety in its interpretation, because accidents are a frightening thing. In fact, it causes feelings of fear and anxiety, so seeing traffic accidents in a dream is considered one of the most disturbing visions that give its owner many evil meanings, but as Imam Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin see that traffic accidents and traffic accidents are not a specific evil in their content, perhaps it is a warning message to the dreamer. Returning to God, as some believe that escaping an accident in a dream is evidence of overcoming the problems and difficulties that the sleeper faces in reality, and in this article you have everything related to seeing an accident in a dream for men and women. Interpretation of a dream about traffic accidents in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing a person in a dream In his dreams, his car falls on him on the road, and this is evidence of many problems and fears that he suffers from, and it may be difficult for him to get out of them. The sleeper’s car that collided with a sidewalk or a tree on the road is evidence of his injury or a major problem, and his escaping from it indicates a good condition, but seeing blood and wounds It causes him a lot of psychological and material losses. An accident in dreams can indicate illness or death. Ibn Sirin believes that traffic accidents in a dream could be a warning sign of a certain matter and perhaps the loss of soul and money. Whoever sees a road accident in a dream that resulted in serious injuries to himself and those who were with him is evidence of the presence of problems and his participation in failed projects that will bring him many losses. And disputes. A dreamed accident can indicate a good situation, as seeing someone crying from an accident or a car accident indicates the arrival of good and abundant money. Interpretation of seeing a car accident for a single woman in a dream: Unmarried people may see many difficult and painful visions during sleep, because Seeing a car accident and damage in a dream is nothing more than a failure to achieve distant dreams and perhaps an inability to face life’s difficulties. An unmarried woman who drives a car very quickly in a dream and crashes it is evidence of her failure in exams and perhaps her engagement being broken. Interpretation of seeing an accident in a married woman’s dreamInterpret Dream scholars see an accident in a married man’s dream due to poor planning and an inability to bear responsibility, and the matter may be evidence of bad choices. Seeing a husband accident in a dream on his way to his wife is one of the visions that carries implicit meanings. It is a warning sign that the wife should be treated gently. It may indicate mistreatment that the husband sees from her, the husband’s accident, and the woman’s crying is not good, and raises many fears and sorrows for the dreamer’s home. A married woman who sees a car accident without injuries in a dream indicates confusion and feelings of anxiety that prevail in this period, and a loud accident indicates Many family problems and disputes. The husband’s survival

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a pin in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about seeing a pin in a dream is the correct interpretation according to the interpretation of dreams by jurists. It is a thin tool made of metal and has a sharp edge that is used to attach one thing to another and a place such as clothes, papers, etc. We often use it in our daily lives, but it will inevitably have another interpretation if we see it. In a dream, and today we will show you the interpretation of a dream to see a pin and learn the interpretation of a pin in a dream about the marriage of unmarried women and pregnant women. Interpretation of a dream about a pin by Ibn Sirin: The interpretation of seeing a pin in a dream as interpreted by Ibn Sirin indicates sadness, anxiety and bad luck. Seeing a throw in a dream It is a sign of bad and false talk about people. A person’s dream of being injured in a dream is evidence of hatred and envy, and people were talking about him illegally. The interpretation of a dream about repairing a head in a dream is evidence of the benefit and opinion of an elderly person. As for seeing a pin stuck in his leg in a dream, this It indicates that the dreamer is exploiting his children and is ashamed of him. Seeing a pinch in the stomach in a dream is evidence that you will get a lot of money and increase your livelihood. As for dreaming of facial beautification in a dream, it is evidence of a fabricated accusation behind me that cannot be justified. To dream of a pin with a piece of wood It is a sign of a loyal servant. Interpretation of seeing a pin by Al-Nabulsi: Al-Nabulsi interprets a pin in a dream as sadness and injustice affecting the dreamer and his family. Seeing a headless pin in a dream is evidence of a bride without a home and furniture. Interpretation of dreaming of a pin in a dream is evidence of a boy or brother. The smallest and what can affect it. Interpretation of a dream about a pin for a single woman: Seeing one girl in a dream pulling a pin from her belongings is evidence that someone is trying to get close to her. An unmarried woman dreaming of holding a pin without getting hurt in the dream is evidence of her relationship and marriage to someone she loves. Seeing a pumpkin in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence that she knows a treacherous, deceitful, and disreputable person, and he must pay attention to her. The interpretation of a girl who sees that she found a pin in a dream is evidence of the shortness of her relationship and marriage. Seeing a pin stuck on the body of an unmarried woman in a dream is evidence. However, his actions and wrong actions need to be reconsidered. The interpretation of seeing a bent and uneven pin in a dream for a single woman explains how people talk about him because of his shameful behavior. Interpretation of seeing a pin for a married woman: Seeing a pin in a married woman’s dream is evidence of many problems and disagreements with Her husband, which may lead to separation and divorce. The interpretation of a dream about seeing doubt attached to the body of a married woman in a dream is evidence that someone is clinging to her and lying about her. Seeing a married woman swallowing a pin in a dream means that she will face many problems and difficulties. Dreaming of losing a pin in a woman’s dream Married is a sign of loss and sadness. The fact that a married woman sees herself using a pin as a weapon to defend herself in a dream is evidence that she will be victorious over her enemies. Interpretation of the appearance of a pin for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pin in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence of the birth of a male child. It indicates the birth of a male child.

title: Interpretation of a dam in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of a dam in a dream is considered one of the most important interpretations of visions that people should know about the leading scholars and commentators on them, including Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Sirin and others. The water dam in visions is mostly good, but the interpretation can change according to the details seen by the fortuneteller and according to its situation at the time of the vision. Below we will show you everything about the opinions of commentators on the interpretation of a dam in a dream for single, married, pregnant women and men, so follow us. Interpretation of a dam in a dream: Seeing a dam Water in which water flows in a dream, symbolizes changing the dreamer’s life for the better, God willing. Seeing a dam in a dream is a symbol of personal strength and is characterized by determination and will. A person's ability to make decisions. Seeing a water dam in a dream symbolizes a halal life. If one sees a water dam in his dream, it can also portend a quick marriage and stability. Seeing a water dam in a married woman's dream indicates her ability to manage her internal affairs. To see a flood in A dam in a dream symbolizes procreation and portends a boy. A person who sees a water dam in his dreams may indicate the giving of this great person. Seeing water dams drying up in a married woman’s dreams is a sign that the dreamer is going through financial crises. Seeing lakes flowing in a dream indicates Many successful projects in the dreamer's life. A married woman who sees a dry dam in her dream indicates a serious illness that she or a family member will suffer from. A man who sees a dam in his dream indicates that the dreamer will obtain a prestigious position and a new job that will bring him all good things. Whoever sees floods in dams in his dreams, means that he will receive a diet that is not ample and permissible. Interpretation of a dam in a dream for a single girl: For an unmarried girl to see in her dreams that she is crossing a water dam, means the coming of comfort after a period of hardship, the coming of goodness in her studies and work, and her excellence. And achieving the highest grades. A single woman who sees a water dam in her dream portends good changes in her life. An unmarried girl who sees a dam collapsing in her dream indicates a delay in her relationship and marriage and that she is going through a state of family tension. Seeing a dam in an unmarried woman’s dream also symbolizes that she She will acquire abundant wealth and goodness. Interpretation of a dam in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a water dam in a married woman’s dream indicates her emotional stability and a strong friendship between her and her husband. Seeing water flowing in dams in a married woman’s dream indicates the nearness of relief from debts and their repayment. Seeing a married woman building a dam Water in her dreams portends her good offspring in the near future, God willing. A married woman who sees dry dams in her dream symbolizes that she is going through financial crises. Interpretation of a dam in a dream for a pregnant woman: For a pregnant woman to dream of water dams indicates the ease and convenience of her birth, God willing. To see a dam Watery in a pregnant woman’s dreams, foretells the imminence of her due date. Seeing her crossing a water dam in a pregnant woman’s dreams portends comfort and abundant food for her and her fetus. Seeing a pregnant woman falling from a water dam denotes

title: Interpretation of a dream about the stomach, the human stomach in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the stomach, whether it is colic, abdominal pain, or stomach disease for a single, married, pregnant, divorced girl, married man, and single young man Seeing the stomach open for Ibn Sirin and more explanations following the topic below Interpretation of the stomach in a dream Since the stomach is one of the important organs in the human body, the stomach in a dream shows the personal strength of the dreamer. Whoever sees the stomach or abdomen in a dream, this may indicate that he is suffering from a disease, and the vision is a warning to him of the need to be careful and take care of his health condition. If the dreamer sees that he is eating food in a dream and cannot digest the food, this indicates that there are some difficult problems that he suffers from and cannot solve. And whoever sees that there is pain, or that his stomach is cracked, or cut into pieces in a dream, the vision indicates breaking some things, or damaging some of the dreamer's things. The symbol of the stomach in a dream One of the meanings of the stomach is that it refers to the kitchen, oven, or stove, which is called the stove, because the stomach is the place where food is cooked and digested, and the kitchen and oven. It is the place where food is cooked and ripened. If one dreams that his stomach has been affected by a defect or disease, this means that an accident or defect may occur in his kitchen. Someone said to the commentator: “I saw my stomach cut into pieces.” He said to him: Your kitchen is ruined, because the cavity cooks everything that enters it. Whoever dreams that he is inside a person’s stomach and his stomach is removed from it, he may be robbed of the blender or cooking utensils and the like. Among the meanings of the stomach is a food container, i.e. a pot, a plate and the like; because it carries what is fed in it, a holder for food utensils, so whoever sees that he has vomited, he can go to a bowl. Or to the blender and so on. Someone said to the dream interpreter: I saw his stomach cut, so he said: Your fate is broken. Among the meanings of the stomach: the balloon and the like; because it resembles a balloon, so whoever dreams that a child pierced the stomach of his little boy may get a balloon. Among the meanings of the stomach also: what money is stored in, the bag, the bag, the cellar, the box, and the like; Because the stomach is a pouch connected to the esophagus and intestines that carries food and carries the bag and the crow, the luggage box and money and he does not know. And whoever sees in his dream that his stomach is lost or stolen, his bag and related things may be lost or stolen. And among the meanings of the stomach are livelihood and money, as the stomach is the place of eating, and food is the essence of life. Money is the basis of life and the table of all animals is money according to the animal. Money can increase. And if he sees on him a disease or a deficiency in expression, whoever sees that he has eaten his stomach indicates that he is eating his money. And if he sees that he is eating someone else's stomach or eating something in someone else's stomach, he can get money from someone else. And whoever dreams of a fire in his stomach may be one of those who eat unjustly from the money of orphans, because God Almighty says that whoever eats unjustly from the money of orphans eats fire in their stomachs, so they pray for it. Price. And perhaps he is one of the eaters of gold and silver, according to what he said, may God bless him and grant him peace. Whoever eats from a vessel of gold and silver will draw the fire of Hell into his stomach, and when the fire comes out of his stomach, he will repent and reject it. Among the meanings of the word “Jawf” are: the people of the house, and the first

title: The 20 most important signs of seeing a hyena in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the symbol of the hyena in a dream? The interpretation of seeing a hyena in a dream is very bad, as it contains many complex meanings and connotations. In the following article you will find the full meanings of this symbol, and discover the most prominent interpretations that Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and leading scholars said about it. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it. .. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Hyena in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about a hyena indicates an intelligent and evil person, and unfortunately he uses his intelligence to harm others and make plans for them. When the dreamer sees a hyena running after him very quickly, opening his mouth and preparing to rush towards him, this is interpreted by an enemy who has prepared his tools to fight the dreamer and will confront him soon. Seeing more than one hyena in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is surrounded by many enemies, and when the dreamer possesses a powerful weapon in a dream and is able to kill the hyenas that surround him, he is stronger and fiercer than his enemies. God gave him the strength that would enable him to defeat his opponents, no matter how clever or cunning they were. If the dreamer sees that he is in a place full of hyenas, he may sleep with swindlers and work magic on innocent people. Unfortunately, he does not know that they have these evil ways, and therefore God wanted to reveal them to him. To stay away from them completely and begin a pure and stable life. The hyena in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin planted calm in the heart of every person who dreams of the symbol of hyenas, even if the vision on the surface indicates conspiracy, evil, and evil, but inside it shows the dreamer’s protection from these enemies, as Ibn Sirin said. The hyena is a human being who hates the dreamer, but he is weak and evil, buried in his heart. He did not have the ability to destroy the dreamer’s life and cause harm to it. There are complex visions that the dreamer sees in a dream, which indicates a double connection, which means that if the dreamer sees the hyena and the lion in the dream, this indicates He has two enemies in his life, one of them is strong and fierce, and he is embodied in the symbol of a lion, and the other is weak and timid, and he is the person who appeared in the image of a hyena in the dream. However, if a hyena is seen in a dream walking behind a crocodile or a snake, then he is a cowardly and weak enemy, and because he does not have the ability to destroy the dreamer, he has used powerful enemies to implement his plans against the dreamer. These enemies are embodied in the form of a crocodile and a snake, and they are the dreamer’s worst enemies, possessing ferocity and audacity. The hyena in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq If the dreamer’s life is full of social and commercial transactions and he sees a hyena in his dream, this is a warning to him that he is about to enter into an agreement that is a ploy to fall into damage and losses. Confirmed Imam Al-Sadiq says that hyenas in a dream are women, and evil and hatred fill their hearts, and they take on a dirty appearance, so if a single person dreams that he is sitting with a hyena or walking next to it and goes to it. A strange and unknown place, a deceitful, evil woman or girl, and if he becomes attached to her and marries her, he will make his life hell. When a married man sees a hyena sleeping in his bed, this is a metaphor for his wife with bad morals, and it is also for someone who is convinced of magic and sorcery, and resorts to them to harm people and disturb their peace. The interpretation of a dream about a hyena for a single woman is interpreted through the atmosphere

Seeing more than one hyena in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is surrounded by many enemies, and when the dreamer possesses a powerful weapon in a dream and is able to kill the hyenas that surround him, he is stronger and fiercer than his enemies. God gave him the strength that would enable him to defeat his opponents, no matter how clever or cunning they were. If the dreamer sees that he is in a place full of hyenas, he may sleep with swindlers and work magic on innocent people. Unfortunately, he does not know that they have these evil ways, and therefore God wanted to reveal them to him. To stay away from them completely and begin a pure and stable life. The hyena in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin planted calm in the heart of every person who dreams of the symbol of hyenas, even if the vision on the surface indicates conspiracy, evil, and evil, but inside it shows the dreamer’s protection from these enemies, as Ibn Sirin said. The hyena is a human being who hates the dreamer, but he is weak and evil, buried in his heart. He did not have the ability to destroy the dreamer’s life and cause harm to it. There are complex visions that the dreamer sees in a dream, which indicates a double connection, which means that if the dreamer sees the hyena and the lion in the dream, this indicates He has two enemies in his life, one of them is strong and fierce, and he is embodied in the symbol of a lion, and the other is weak and timid, and he is the person who appeared in the image of a hyena in the dream. However, if a hyena is seen in a dream walking behind a crocodile or a snake, then he is a cowardly and weak enemy, and because he does not have the ability to destroy the dreamer, he has used powerful enemies to implement his plans against the dreamer. These enemies are embodied in the form of a crocodile and a snake, and they are the dreamer’s worst enemies, possessing ferocity and audacity. The hyena in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq If the dreamer’s life is full of social and commercial transactions and he sees a hyena in his dream, this is a warning to him that he is about to enter into an agreement that is a ploy to fall into damage and losses. Confirmed Imam Al-Sadiq says that hyenas in a dream are women, and evil and hatred fill their hearts, and they take on a dirty appearance, so if a single person dreams that he is sitting with a hyena or walking next to it and goes to it. A strange and unknown place, a deceitful, evil woman or girl, and if he becomes attached to her and marries her, he will make his life hell. When a married man sees a hyena sleeping in his bed, this is a metaphor for his wife with bad morals, and it is also for someone who is convinced of magic and sorcery, and resorts to them to harm people and disturb their peace. The interpretation of a dream about a hyena for a single woman is interpreted through the atmosphere
